name: ClikPals Network
tag_list: social-business-platform, social-business, internet-business, small-businesses, netpreneurs, social-networking-and-businesses
description: ClikPals is a social business platform..
overview:
ClikPals – Social Business Networking Platform that aims to help the general public internet users to earn revenues while they connect, share and communicate with the people around them and the world. It’s free to join, and anyone can join to create a digital social economy for the planet.

ClikPals’ goal is to focus on empowering and encouraging individuals, micro-businesses, enterpreneurs, small and medium sized enterprises and corporations across the globe.

ClikPals envisions an ecosystem of “netrepreneurs” using the platform to give individuals, micro-businesses, enterpreneurs, small and medium sized enterprises and corporations an online presence powered with the latest advances in internet technology and social media trends to empower themselves and grow their businesses globally. This vision is a clear example of turning constraints into opportunity - turning the “curse of the numbers” to “the power of the numbers”, with reference to the billions of individuals, small businesses and entrepreneurs that are struggling to emerge.

external_links.title: The Pillars of Social Business with ClikPals
